Content Protocols

  • UITableViewCellContent

    Represents the content of the UITableViewCell. The content rendering the component does not always required to conform to this. Make content conform to this protocol when you want to receive UITableViewCell-specific behavior.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public protocol UITableViewCellContent
  • UITableViewHeaderFooterViewContent

    Represents the content of the UITableViewHeaderFooterView. The content rendering the component does not always required to conform to this. Make content conform to this protocol when you want to receive UITableViewHeaderFooterView-specific behavior.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public protocol UITableViewHeaderFooterViewContent
  • UICollectionViewCellContent

    Represents the content of the UICollectionViewCell. The content rendering the component does not always required to conform to this. Make content conform to this protocol when you want to receive UICollectionViewCell-specific behavior.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public protocol UICollectionViewCellContent
  • UICollectionReusableViewContent

    Represents the content of the UICollectionReusableView. The content rendering the component does not always required to conform to this. Make content conform to this protocol when you want to receive UICollectionReusableView-specific behavior.

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public protocol UICollectionReusableViewContent
